news.body: Please report bugs on the Discord ialr-dl2-bug-reporting channel, thanks and happy gaming
IALR Custom traders currently broken due to unknown backend protections, Mod config settings for traders also not working due to something being protected

IALR has a compatibility patch to make the latest official event playable with the mod installed, head over to the Nexus and grab the latest version of the launcher and head to the Installer/Events and make sure to install with the event enabled. If you don't want the community event on, make sure to not turn on the event when playing IALR offline for full features.
The city no longer is safe during the day. The infected no longer suffer from the sunlight and will stop at nothing to kill you.
Tired of humans being the least scary thing on the map? Active this module and fear the living
Tired of getting slaughtered by the Volatiles at night? Now you can roam free using the Casual Survivor spawn settings but without Volatiles

news.header: New Remove Weapon Mod Visuals Module
news.body: Want to get rid of those attachments on your weapons that ruin your sense of immersion? Toggle on this module to enjoy the game without the cluttered weapon appearances
All of the supporting language packs have been recreated and the Czech language support has been added!
This system is designed to give you a chance at unique Epic moments while you play, enemies and allies will spawn inside the world randomly based on your Mod difficulty.
The Day hunter, Night Hunter, Volatile, Chase, and Screamer Noise systems have been restored with new balancing for all difficulties. Day Hunter is disabled on Casual and Survivor.
The chase system has gotten a much needed tuning. Still a WIP and feedback is appreciated across the different difficulties.

Vampires can be found throughout the world at night and in some interiors. They are friends of no one but their clan and move deadly fast. Run if you are not high enough level to take them on, as they will call for other nearby Vampires when you are spotted. Evil Clowns have joined the world and can be found randomly through encounters. The event is still be fully updated and implemented, but thankfully the launcher should make this easy to get the updates!
Many improvements to the AI's ability to detect and interact with the world and each other, fixes for aggression and blocking.
Started fresh on re-balancing every difficulty, your feedback is appreciated

news.header: Removal of visual effects from Biters and Infected
news.body: Feedback is always appreciated on the mod, especially if it's something that is causing players frustration
Utilizing the new chaos system, Warzones is back with a much needed upgrade. The cities will now spawn groups/squads of enemies that will band together to take down their foes.
A small fix to update the mod to work with the new instant heal items
Fix for a glitch causing players to not be able to draw their crossbows or bows
Fix for a hazmat virals not chasing the player or moving
This was occuring on some quests. This should be better balanced, but also try sleeping till daytime or use camouflage to help lose the scent of enemies

news.header: Fix for only Biter Camouflage spawning
news.body: Better balancing for all types of camouflage to spawn on special infected

news.header: Fix for Volatile Hives spawning outdoors
news.body: This fix should prevent as many hives showing up outdoors

news.header: Reduction to Goons and Demolishers on Ultimate
news.body: Reduced the amount of chaos agents that spawn goons and demolishers on Ultimate Difficulty
Removed and reduced the amount of chaos agents working on Survivor Difficulty
